headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  CALICCHIO, STEVEN C

snippet: CALICCHIO--Steven C. April 18, 1961 - June 21, 2008 To our beloved son, brother and father, There was no one like you; free spirited, kind, generous and talented. You are missed & loved everyday. Forever in our hearts. Your Loving Family 1/3
lead_paragraph: CALICCHIO--Steven C. April 18, 1961 - June 21, 2008 To our beloved son, brother and father, There was no one like you; free spirited, kind, generous and talented. You are missed & loved everyday. Forever in our hearts. Your Loving Family 1/3
